title: From Nijigaku to the World!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Hey, you two, Lanzhu’s got a great idea, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>This is....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>....” The Global School Idol Fan Conversion Plan”? What does that mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Geez, it’s exactly as it says. You didn’t know anything about school idols back when you were in NYC, right, Mia? So we’re going to tell the world how wonderful school idols are and how great everyone in Nijigaku is!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>So you want to turn everyone in the world into a school idol fan? You always come up with these crazy things.... Come on, Emma, say something to her too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>....Amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You’re amazing, Lanzhu-chan!! I’ve also been thinking of the same thing! Even though school idols are this wonderful, there are still so many people in the world who don’t know about them. So as the ones who already know, we should spread the word!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah, Lanzhu knew you would understand, Emma! It’s settled then. Let’s start right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wait, Emma!? Did you even read it!? It said, “First, let’s hijack video streaming sites from all over the world with footage of Nijigaku”! We can’t just do that, I’m telling you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
